Dexamethasone Premedication for Pemetrex.name: Dexamethasone Premedication
Dexamethasone Premedication for Pemetrex.description: Dexamethasone 4 mg PO BID on the day before, day of, and day after pemetrexed to reduce skin rash
Dexamethasone Premedication for Pemetrex.notes: Administered on Days 0–2 relative to chemotherapy Day 1 to prevent pemetrexed-induced skin toxicity. PO = by mouth; BID = twice daily.
